name: Jordi Febrian Nappu
bio: As a dedicated and results-driven Software Quality Assurance (SQA) Engineer with over 3+ years of hands-on experience, I specialize in ensuring the delivery of robust, high-quality software solutions. My focus areas include manual testing, automation testing, and performance testing, where I combine technical precision with a deep understanding of user expectations to drive excellence in software development.
This collection represents my carefully curated toolkit that I use daily. Each tool here has been tested and proven to add value to my workflow. Feel free to explore and suggest new additions!
